data.lyric:
[ti:Here Comes Santa Claus ]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:美国怪谭第2季 电视原声带 American Horror Story Season 2(Original Soundtrack) ]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Here Comes Santa Claus (Right Down Santa Claus Lane) (1947 Version) - Gene Autry
[00:10.75]Here comes Santa Claus  here comes Santa Claus
[00:13.35]Right down Santa Claus Lane
[00:15.92]Vixen Blitzen all his reindeer
[00:18.30]Pulling on the reins
[00:20.91]Bells are ringing children singing
[00:23.23]All is merry and bright
[00:25.57]So hang your stockings and say a prayer
[00:28.00]Cause Santa Claus comes tonight
[00:30.87]Here comes Santa Claus  here comes Santa Claus
[00:33.20]Riding down Santa Claus Lane
[00:35.78]He's got a bag that's filled with toys
[00:37.92]For boys and girls again
[00:40.78]Hear those sleigh bells jingle jangle
[00:43.57]What a beautiful sight
[00:45.46]So jump in bed and cover up your head
[00:47.79]Because Santa Claus comes tonight
[01:10.72]Here comes Santa Claus  here comes Santa Claus
[01:13.05]Riding down Santa Claus Lane
[01:15.68]He doesn't care if you're a rich or poor boy
[01:17.80]He loves you just the same
[01:20.60]Santa Claus
[01:21.09]Knows that we're God's children
[01:22.97]That makes everything right
[01:25.30]So fill your hears with Christmas cheer
[01:27.77]Cause Santa Claus comes tonight
[01:30.63]Here comes Santa Claus here comes Santa Claus
[01:33.04]Riding down Santa Claus Lane
[01:35.56]He'll come around when the chimes ring out
[01:37.79]It's Christmas morn again
[01:40.52]Peace on Earth will come to all
[01:42.74]If we just follow the light
[01:45.35]So Let's give thanks to the Lord above
[01:47.72]Cause Santa Claus comes tonight
[01:50.70]
[02:10.58]Here comes Santa Claus  here comes Santa Claus
[02:12.95]Right down Santa Claus Lane
[02:15.48]Vixen Blitzen all his reindeer
[02:17.94]Pulling on the reins
[02:20.54]Bells are ringing children singing
[02:22.92]All is merry and bright
[02:25.53]Hang your stockings and say a prayer
[02:27.64]Cause Santa Claus comes tonight
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:美国怪谭第2季 电视原声带 American Horror Story Season 2(Original Soundtrack) ]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.75]圣诞老人来了 圣诞老人来了
[00:13.35]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[00:15.92]雌狐 闪电以及他所有的驯鹿
[00:18.30]都拉着缰绳
[00:20.91]铃儿叮当 孩子们欢唱
[00:23.23]一片欢乐与光明
[00:25.57]快挂上你红色袜子 说出你的愿望
[00:28.00]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[00:30.87]圣诞老人来了 圣诞老人来了
[00:33.20]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[00:35.78]他带着满满一袋的玩具
[00:37.92]送给男孩和女孩们
[00:40.78]聆听见那雪橇铃儿叮当响彻
[00:43.57]那是多么美妙的情景
[00:45.46]快钻进被窝盖住头
[00:47.79]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[01:10.72]圣诞老人来了 圣诞老人来了
[01:13.05]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[01:15.68]他不在乎你是富有还是贫穷
[01:17.80]他都爱你
[01:20.60]圣诞老人
[01:21.09]知道我们都是上帝的孩子
[01:22.97]已做好一切准备
[01:25.30]所以 听着圣诞的欢呼吧
[01:27.77]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[01:30.63]圣诞老人来了圣诞老人来了
[01:33.04]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[01:35.56]当编钟鸣响他就将来到你我身边
[01:37.79]又是圣诞节的黎明
[01:40.52]那这星球就将一派祥和与安宁
[01:42.74]倘若我们紧随那光明
[01:45.35]就让我们感恩于那上苍的主
[01:47.72]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[01:50.70]
[02:10.58]圣诞老人来了 圣诞老人来了
[02:12.95]就沿着圣诞老人的小路
[02:15.48]雌狐 闪电以及他所有的驯鹿
[02:17.94]都拉着缰绳
[02:20.54]铃儿叮当 孩子们欢唱
[02:22.92]一片欢乐与光明
[02:25.53]快挂上你红色袜子 说出你的愿望
[02:27.64]因为圣诞老人今晚就要来
[02:29.97]
